constellations.name: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
constellations.effect: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.\nThis effect can occur once every 0.2s.

constellations.name: All Streams Flow to the Sea
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kurage's Oath</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sango Isshin
constellations.effect: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color>, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color> for 4s when her Normal and Charged Attacks heal, or would heal, any party member with 80% or more HP.

constellations.name: A Comrade's Duty
constellations.effect: When a character protected by Thoma's own <color=#FFD780FF>Blazing Barrier</color> (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own <color=#FFD780FF>Blazing Blessing</color> CD is decreased by 3s, while his own <color=#FFD780FF>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s CD is decreased by 3s.\nThis effect can be triggered once every 20s.

constellations.name: A Subordinate's Skills
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>'s duration is increased by 3s.

constellations.name: Fortified Resolve
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Blazing Blessing</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Long-Term Planning
constellations.effect: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Crimson Ooyoroi</color>, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

constellations.name: Raging Wildfire
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Crimson Ooyoroi</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Burning Heart
constellations.effect: When a <color=#FFD780FF>Blazing Barrier</color> is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

weapons.desc: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.
weapons.name: Whiteblind
weapons.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

weapons.desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.
weapons.name: Prototype Archaic
weapons.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240%/300%/360%/420%/480% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

weapons.desc: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.
weapons.name: Dragon's Bane
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20%/24%/28%/32%/36%.

weapons.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
weapons.name: Sacrificial Bow
weapons.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s/26s/22s/19s/16s.

weapons.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
weapons.name: Alley Hunter
weapons.effect: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2%/2.5%/3%/3.5%/4% every second up to a max of 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% per second until it reaches 0%.

weapons.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.
weapons.name: Favonius Lance
weapons.effect: CRIT Hits have a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s/10.5s/9s/7.5s/6s.

weapons.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.
weapons.name: Skyward Pride
weapons.effect: Increases all DMG by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80%/100%/120%/140%/160% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

weapons.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.
weapons.name: Prototype Amber
weapons.effect: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4/4.5/5/5.5/6 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4%/4.5%/5%/5.5%/6% HP every 2s for this duration.

weapons.desc: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.
weapons.name: Skyward Harp
weapons.effect: Increases CRIT DMG by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Hits have a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s/3.5s/3s/2.5s/2s.

weapons.desc: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.
weapons.name: Windblume Ode
weapons.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% for 6s.

weapons.desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.
weapons.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
weapons.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 80%/95%/110%/125%/140% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 200%/240%/280%/320%/360% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.
weapons.name: Festering Desire
weapons.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%.

weapons.desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.
weapons.name: The Black Sword
weapons.effect: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Additionally, regenerates 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

weapons.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
weapons.name: Sacrificial Sword
weapons.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s/26s/22s/19s/16s.

weapons.desc: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.
weapons.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
weapons.effect: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

weapons.desc: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.
weapons.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
weapons.effect: HP increased by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2%/1.5%/1.8%/2.1%/2.4% of the wielder's Max HP.

weapons.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.
weapons.name: Favonius Warbow
weapons.effect: CRIT Hits have a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s/10.5s/9s/7.5s/6s.

weapons.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.
weapons.name: Amos' Bow
weapons.effect: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

weapons.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.
weapons.name: Staff of Homa
weapons.effect: HP increased by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8%/1%/1.2%/1.4%/1.6% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional 1%/1.2%/1.4%/1.6%/1.8% of Max HP.

weapons.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.
weapons.name: Favonius Codex
weapons.effect: CRIT Hits have a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s/10.5s/9s/7.5s/6s.

weapons.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.
weapons.name: Skyward Blade
weapons.effect: CRIT Rate increased by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%/10%/10%/10%/10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%/10%/10%/10%/10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

weapons.desc: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
weapons.name: Serpent Spine
weapons.effect: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% more DMG and take 3%/2.7%/2.4%/2.2%/2% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

weapons.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.
weapons.name: Skyward Spine
weapons.effect: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%/12%/12%/12%/12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50%/50%/50%/50%/50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40%/55%/70%/85%/100% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

weapons.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!
weapons.name: Favonius Sword
weapons.effect: CRIT Hits have a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s/10.5s/9s/7.5s/6s.

weapons.desc: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.
weapons.name: Black Tassel
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against slimes by 40%/50%/60%/70%/80%.

weapons.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.
weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
weapons.effect: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain a 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

weapons.desc: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.
weapons.name: Lion's Roar
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 20%/24%/28%/32%/36%.

weapons.desc: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.
weapons.name: The Widsith
weapons.effect: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60%/75%/90%/105%/120%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%/60%/72%/84%/96%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240/300/360/420/480.

weapons.desc: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.
weapons.name: The Unforged
weapons.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.desc: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.
weapons.name: Rust
weapons.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

weapons.desc: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.
weapons.name: Skyward Atlas
weapons.effect: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing 160%/200%/240%/280%/320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

weapons.desc: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.
weapons.name: Wolf's Gravestone
weapons.effect: Increases ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

weapons.desc: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.
weapons.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
weapons.effect: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2%/3.9%/4.6%/5.3%/6% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.desc: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.
weapons.name: Royal Spear
weapons.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

weapons.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.
weapons.name: Mappa Mare
weapons.effect: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

weapons.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
weapons.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
weapons.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s/26s/22s/19s/16s.

weapons.desc: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.
weapons.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.desc: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.
weapons.name: Debate Club
weapons.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 60%/75%/90%/105%/120% of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

weapons.desc: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.
weapons.name: Eye of Perception
weapons.effect: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240%/270%/300%/330%/360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12s/11s/10s/9s/8s.

weapons.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
weapons.name: The Flute
weapons.effect: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

weapons.desc: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.
weapons.name: The Stringless
weapons.effect: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48%.

weapons.desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.
weapons.name: Prototype Rancour
weapons.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

weapons.desc: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.
weapons.name: The Bell
weapons.effect: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20%/23%/26%/29%/32% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s/45s/45s/45s/45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% increased DMG.

weapons.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.
weapons.name: Prototype Crescent
weapons.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36%/45%/54%/63%/72% for 10s.

weapons.desc: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.
weapons.name: The Viridescent Hunt
weapons.effect: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14s/13s/12s/11s/10s.

weapons.desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
weapons.name: Harbinger of Dawn
weapons.effect: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%.

weapons.desc: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.
weapons.name: Lithic Blade
weapons.effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7%/8%/9%/10%/11% ATK increase and a 3%/4%/5%/6%/7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

weapons.desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil â€” just like the last heroine who wielded it.
weapons.name: Aquila Favonia
weapons.effect: ATK is increased by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100%/115%/130%/145%/160% of ATK and dealing 200%/230%/260%/290%/320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

weapons.desc: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.
weapons.name: Song of Broken Pines
weapons.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% and increases ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

weapons.desc: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.
weapons.name: Lithic Spear
weapons.effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7%/8%/9%/10%/11% ATK increase and a 3%/4%/5%/6%/7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

weapons.desc: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.
weapons.name: Blackcliff Warbow
weapons.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.desc: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.
weapons.name: Deathmatch
weapons.effect: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% and DEF is increased by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48%.

weapons.desc: A grudge discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.
weapons.name: Prototype Starglitter
weapons.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

weapons.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.
weapons.name: Wine and Song
weapons.effect: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by 14%/16%/18%/20%/22% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 5s.

weapons.desc: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.
weapons.name: Blackcliff Longsword
weapons.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.desc: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.
weapons.name: Sacrificial Fragments
weapons.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s/26s/22s/19s/16s.

weapons.desc: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.
weapons.name: Blackcliff Slasher
weapons.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.desc: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.
weapons.name: Crescent Pike
weapons.effect: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% of ATK for 5s.

weapons.desc: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.
weapons.name: Compound Bow
weapons.effect: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2%/1.5%/1.8%/2.1%/2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

weapons.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.
weapons.name: Favonius Greatsword
weapons.effect: CRIT Hits have a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s/10.5s/9s/7.5s/6s.

weapons.desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.
weapons.name: Solar Pearl
weapons.effect: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 6s.

weapons.desc: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.
weapons.name: Cool Steel
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.desc: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.
weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.effect: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160%/200%/240%/280%/320% ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.desc: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.
weapons.name: Blackcliff Pole
weapons.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.desc: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.
weapons.name: White Tassel
weapons.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48%.

weapons.desc: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.
weapons.name: The Alley Flash
weapons.effect: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

weapons.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
weapons.name: Dragonspine Spear
weapons.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 80%/95%/110%/125%/140% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 200%/240%/280%/320%/360% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.desc: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.
weapons.name: Fillet Blade
weapons.effect: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 240%/280%/320%/360%/400% ATK DMG to a single target. Can only occur once every 15s/14s/13s/12s/11s.

weapons.desc: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.
weapons.name: Twin Nephrite
weapons.effect: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20% for 15s.

weapons.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
weapons.name: Skyrider Sword
weapons.effect: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

weapons.desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
weapons.name: Vortex Vanquisher
weapons.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.desc: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.
weapons.name: Elegy for the End
weapons.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by 60/75/90/105/120. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by 100/125/150/175/200 and increases ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

weapons.desc: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.
weapons.name: White Iron Greatsword
weapons.effect: Defeating an opponent restores 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% HP.

weapons.desc: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.
weapons.name: Rainslasher
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%/24%/28%/32%/36%.

weapons.desc: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.
weapons.name: Ferrous Shadow
weapons.effect: When HP falls below 70%/75%/80%/85%/90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

weapons.desc: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.
weapons.name: Recurve Bow
weapons.effect: Defeating an opponent restores 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% HP.

weapons.desc: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.
weapons.name: Memory of Dust
weapons.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.desc: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.
weapons.name: Slingshot
weapons.effect: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

weapons.desc: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.
weapons.name: Blackcliff Agate
weapons.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.desc: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.
weapons.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
weapons.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1%/1.25%/1.5%/1.75%/2% HP.

weapons.desc: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.
weapons.name: Summit Shaper
weapons.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.desc: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.
weapons.name: Iron Sting
weapons.effect: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

weapons.desc: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.
weapons.name: Otherworldly Story
weapons.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1%/1.25%/1.5%/1.75%/2% HP.

weapons.desc: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."
weapons.name: Emerald Orb
weapons.effect: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 12s.

weapons.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.
weapons.name: Skyrider Greatsword
weapons.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

weapons.desc: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
weapons.name: Messenger
weapons.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.desc: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.
weapons.name: Raven Bow
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
weapons.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48%.

weapons.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.
weapons.name: Magic Guide
weapons.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by royals only.
weapons.name: Royal Greatsword
weapons.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

weapons.desc: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.
weapons.name: Royal Longsword
weapons.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

weapons.desc: An old royal longbow that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.
weapons.name: Royal Bow
weapons.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

weapons.desc: A book that once belonged to a royal mage of Mondstadt. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.
weapons.name: Royal Grimoire
weapons.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

weapons.desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.
weapons.name: Frostbearer
weapons.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to 80%/95%/110%/125%/140% of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to 200%/240%/280%/320%/360% of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.desc: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.
weapons.name: Dark Iron Sword
weapons.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 12s.

weapons.desc: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.
weapons.name: Mitternachts Waltz
weapons.effect: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 5s.

weapons.desc: A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot help but laugh.\nEven those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbed by the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.
weapons.name: Dodoco Tales
weapons.effect: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% for 6s. Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% for 6s.

weapons.desc: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.
weapons.name: Freedom-Sworn
weapons.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% and increases ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

weapons.desc: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.
weapons.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
weapons.effect: Gain a 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% Elemental DMG Bonus for all elements and receive the might of the Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28%/10/20/35%/12/24/42%/14/28/49%/16/32/56% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of the Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

weapons.desc: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.
weapons.name: Sword of Descension
weapons.effect:
Effective only on the following platform: 
"PlayStation Network"
Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a 50%/undefined/undefined/undefined/undefined chance to deal 200%/undefined/undefined/undefined/undefined ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66/undefined/undefined/undefined/undefined.

weapons.desc: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.
weapons.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
weapons.effect: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates 6/7.5/9/10.5/12 Energy for each seed consumed.

weapons.desc: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.
weapons.name: Kitain Cross Spear
weapons.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3/3.5/4/4.5/5 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

weapons.desc: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.
weapons.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
weapons.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3/3.5/4/4.5/5 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

weapons.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.
weapons.name: Hakushin Ring
weapons.effect: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

weapons.desc: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.
weapons.name: Hamayumi
weapons.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% and Charged Attack DMG by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.desc: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.
weapons.name: Thundering Pulse
weapons.effect: Increases ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by 12/24/40%/15/30/50%/18/36/60%/21/42/70%/24/48/80%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

weapons.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...
weapons.name: Engulfing Lightning
weapons.effect: ATK increased by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of 80%/90%/100%/110%/120% ATK. Gain 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

weapons.desc: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.
weapons.name: Predator
weapons.effect:
Effective only on the following platform: 
"PlayStation Network"
Dealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

weapons.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.
weapons.name: "The Catch"
weapons.effect: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%.

weapons.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.
weapons.name: Everlasting Moonglow
weapons.effect: Healing Bonus increased by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by 1%/1.5%/2%/2.5%/3% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

weapons.desc: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.
weapons.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
weapons.effect: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

weapons.name: Polar Star
weapons.effect: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by 10/20/30/48%/12.5/25/37.5/60%/15/30/45/72%/17.5/35/52.5/84%/20/40/60/96%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

weapons.name: Akuoumaru
weapons.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12%/0.15%/0.18%/0.21%/0.24%. A maximum of 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

weapons.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
weapons.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12%/0.15%/0.18%/0.21%/0.24%. A maximum of 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

weapons.name: Mouun's Moon
weapons.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12%/0.15%/0.18%/0.21%/0.24%. A maximum of 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

affixes.effect: Pyro DMG Bonus +15%
Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.
Elemental Burst DMG +20%
Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.
Electro DMG Bonus +15%
Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.
Character Healing Effectiveness +15%
Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.
Anemo DMG Bonus +15%
Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.
Hydro DMG Bonus +15%
After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.
If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.
Cryo DMG Bonus +15%
When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.
Pyro RES increased by 40%.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.
HP increased by 20%.

When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.
Physical DMG +25%
After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.
Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.
Physical DMG is increased by 25%.

When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.
Electro RES increased by 40%.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.
Increases Shield Strength by 35%.
While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.
CRIT Rate +12%
When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.
Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.
Gain a 15% Geo DMG Bonus.

Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.
Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.
Energy Recharge +20%
Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.
Energy Recharge +20%
Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.
DEF +30%
For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.
Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.
Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 20%.
Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.
Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.
All Elemental RES increased by 20%.
Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.
Affected by Electro for 40% less time.
Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.
Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.
When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/ Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s.
Energy Recharge +20%
Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.
